# Request for Standing Offer - Environmental Engineering Services for National Parks and National Historic Sites
## Notice Recording Number and Reference
Reference Number: cb-774-96900088
Amendment Number: 5
Solicitation Number: 5P468-24-0003/A

## Overview
The Parks Canada Agency invites consulting firms with Environmental Engineering expertise to submit proposals for Standing Offers. The selected consultants shall provide professional and technical services for various types of environmental services on an "as-and-when-requested" basis in National Parks and National Historic Sites, excluding locations within Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCAs).

## Required Services
The technical disciplines anticipated within each region include:

i. environmental impact assessment, permitting, and related studies
ii. environmental management of federal facilities
iii. contaminated sites consulting services
iv. construction planning, design, and supervision related to environmental projects

Specific tasks may include:

- conducting risk assessments and hazardous material/waste surveys
- developing remediation action plans, cost estimates, and tender documents
- providing advice, training, and site supervision

## Enquiries and Response
All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing and should be received no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.

## Information
- All work must be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
- Solicitation documents and addenda can be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca).
- Bidders are responsible for any failure attributable to the transmission or receipt of the emailed bid due to file size.

## Important Notes
- Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official.
- Only the email address "soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca" will be accepted for responses to proposal solicitations.
- The maximum email file size that Parks Canada is capable of receiving is 15 megabytes.
- Emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted. Bid documents must be sent as email attachments.

## Deadline
Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-04T14:00:00
Note: Please refer to the solicitation document for complete details and specific requirements for bid submission. [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37358/rfso---
